We do design so you can do life

There’s more to life than waiting for the lights to change, which is why the OCTAVIA is full of features designed for drivers who need space, smart features and flexibility, without compromising on performance or looks.

A warm welcome

Say yes to adventure and yes to new experiences. The OCTAVIA offers flexible and roomy design, combined with the creature comforts you expect.

Generous Space

Interior Light Pack

Panoramic Sunroof

A warm welcome

Generous Space

Whether you’re stashing fitness kit, schoolbags or shopping, the OCTAVIA has all the space you could need. In fact, with one of the largest boots in its class, there’s up to 1,740 litres to play with.

1/3

A warm welcome

Interior light pack

Switch moods in an instant, with 10 colour options to create the perfect atmosphere.

2/3

A warm welcome

Panoramic Sunroof

Perfect for sun worshippers, or just those who like a breath of fresh air, there’s an electrically adjusted panoramic sunroof and blind.

3/3

Convenience

Rewrite the rules for family cars. The OCTAVIA is packed with practical features to keep everyone smiling.

Convenience

Heated Window

Get your mornings off to a speedy start, with no more time spent standing in the cold trying to clear a windscreen.

1/4

Convenience

Rear USBs

Relax as two USB ports in the rear keep passengers happy whatever devices they are using.

2/4

Convenience

Rear View Camera

Hidden under the boot handle, the rear-view camera makes light work of reverse parking, while the integrated washer keeps objects visible.

3/4

Convenience

Trailer Assist

• Reversing with a trailer has never been easier as Trailer Assist helps you manoeuvre safely.

4/4

Infotainment

Energetic kids and restless adults won’t have anything to complain about with the latest in entertainment systems. Meanwhile smart assistance helps you get from A to B quickly and safely.

Smartlink +

Canton Sound System

Satellite Navigation

Gesture Control

Infotainment

Smartlink +

A perfect companion for every family trip, with helpful services including navigation, traffic and weather at your fingertips.

1/4

Infotainment

Canton Sound System

Singing along in the car to your favourite tunes is one of life’s little pleasures. So make the most of the premium German CANTON Sound System delivering powerful clarity from 10 speakers.

2/4

Infotainment

Satellite Navigation

Never be late for a meeting again as the Columbus navigation system with 9.2” touchscreen display and integrated Wi-Fi will ensure you get from A to B.

3/4

Infotainment

Gesture Control

Motion sensors in the centre display screen let you call up menus without having to touch the screen.

4/4

Practicality

Simply clever features, designed to make life easier.

Double sided floor matt

Bin in doors

Umbrella under the front passenger seat

Practicality

Double Sided Floor Matt

Whether its walking the dog or taking a trip to the garden centre, there’s always times when you need to keep your car interiors clean. Switching to the rubber side of the mat is the answer.

1/3

Practicality

Door Bin

There’s no need to keep clearing up parking receipts and crisp packets from the floor, thanks to the handy waste bins which clip onto door panels.

2/3

Practicality

Umbrella under the front passenger seat

We can't make British weather less unpredictable, so instead we've put an umbrella under the front passenger’s seat for your convenience.

3/3

Accessories

Say goodbye to uncomfortable car journeys. Heated electric seats and ambient lighting provide home comforts on the move.
